issues.description: The signature of getAllPersons in PersonService differs between the template and the solution. The template defines getAllPersons(PersonSortingOptions), but the solution adds a second boolean parameter (includeInactive) not mentioned in the problem statement. Students won’t know to include this extra parameter, causing confusion and making the provided solution incompatible with the template.
issues.suggested_fix: Either remove the extra includeInactive parameter from the solution’s getAllPersons method so it matches the template signature, or update the template (and problem statement) to document and include the boolean parameter—to ensure all artifacts agree on the method signature.
